item.title: SSH Tunnels for Local Development
item.description: Local Port Forwarding A service running on specific port of the server is accessible on a specific port of the local machine. Example +---------------------+ +-----------------------+ | | | | | +---------------+ | SSH Tunnel | +-----------------+ | | | | <-----------------------+ | | | | | mongodb:27017 | | | | localhost:27018 | | | | | +-----------------------> | | | | +---------------+ | 27017:27018 | +-----------------+ | | | | | +---------------------+ +-----------------------+ Server Local Let’s assume a MongoDB service is running on the server on port 27017 and is not accessible outside of the server.
